p: CC-486 is a novel oral formulation of azacitidine that allows for prolonged azacitidine exposure and sustained DNA hypomethylation over the entire 28-day treatment cycle by using extended dosing schedules [ 21, 22]. Here, we report final results of a prospective phase I/II dose-finding study of CC-486 maintenance treatment after alloSCT in patients with AML or MDS.
